img_above_text:
As you begin to step out onto the inner walkway, a voice will call out from the next cell, which has a mysterious purple seal you can't break. You can still speak to the person inside, sitting against a wall next to a dead Rat Captain.
They'll warn you against trying to make your own way, but you can't exactly do nothing. Still, it pays to heed their warning -- this place is not going to be easy to traverse, especially with minds "ebbing away with the tides of chants".
img_below_text:
Be extra wary when exploring this area, as there are many Cyan Bats hiding up on ceilings. They'll divebomb you with little warning, and explode with ice to harass you as you deal with other threats.
Past the first Cyan Bat, be sure to check the first open cell on the left to find a Wisp to absorb, and a Snake-Head Mushroom to harvest.

        - Following Text: "Be extra wary when exploring this area, as there are many Cyan Bats hiding up on ceilings. They'll divebomb you with little warning, and explode with ice to harass you as you deal with other threats.
Past the first Cyan Bat, be sure to check the first open cell on the left to find a Wisp to absorb, and a Snake-Head Mushroom to harvest."

        Your task:

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, eerie environment with a cloaked character wielding a staff, standing near twisted organic structures and a barred cell. The lighting highlights the ominous atmosphere, with glowing particles scattered throughout. The preceding text suggests this area is part of a challenging traversal in the game, with warnings about mental strain and dangers ahead. The following text highlights the presence of Cyan Bats and collectible items, indicating that exploration and combat are key gameplay elements in this location. The dialogue at the bottom, "That includes yours too," adds a foreboding tone to the scene.
